message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Can we discuss further?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. How about we meet at $130? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above that.
